column1: babies are cute, but then they grow up
Instead of the show Bet on Your Baby, we need a Bet on Your Overwhelmed High School or Undergraduate Student Because Shit Like This Didn’t Exist Before
darkarchermerlyn replied to your post:Bet on Your Baby
Omg just turned on ABC in preparation for SYFO and what the heck is this show I’m beyond confused…
This is basically a new form of whoring out your kid for 15 minutes of fame. ><  I just…..DONE
I think it kind of says something about the education system in America that people are willing to play a game show just to win money for their kids college fund
